rating_comment: Whenever I stayed in Dhaka for the last couple of years, I remained at Rudmilas flat because I felt like I was at my home. It's very close to Airport and surrounded by many Restaurants. Easy to move around another part of any posh area like Gulshan, Banani, Baridhara, DOHS, I.e.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · July 2022,  · Stayed one night
rating_comment: Amazing to stay there again. The host, Rudmila, is a good human being. She always responds to us whenever I need her.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · June 2022,  · Group trip
rating_comment: Great location, interior and amenities. Professional hosting. Highly recommended.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · May 2022,  · Stayed with kids
rating_comment: The place is exactly same as the picture shows. Definitely very spacious place. I wish I can give it more then 5 stars it is because of Shilpi (caretaker). She is the most humble, sweet, caring, and the nicest person I ever met. She took care of the place and engaged with us like we are family. She is the gem of the place. I am definitely booking this place again when I plan of visiting Bangladesh.

rating_comment: It's not new to me staying in this apartment. Everything was good to me as it was before.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · March 2022,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: I stayed here a couple of months ago; everything was pleasant to me as I expected. Last time I felt it was my second home, and the host Rudmila, is a fantastic person who always got back to me whenever I needed her assistance.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · March 2022,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: We would like to thank Rudmila for a great stay. Her communication and checking in on us was greatly appreciated. Shilpi was lovely and communicated very politely with us too. This apartment and set up is a beautiful place and we will definitely be returning when we visit Bangladesh next. The rooms are true to the pictures and exactly what we expected. The building block is situated within very close proximity to all amenities, with swapno supermarket within approx 2 min walk of the building, and all other shops and bazaars in similar distance.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · February 2022,  · Stayed one night
rating_comment: Have a nice weekend at this house come back again .

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · December 2021,  · Group trip
rating_comment: First of all, it was a wise decision to choose Spacious Apartment. The location was in a good position where I could easily access all the roots, including the shopping mall & airport, which was my first focus. The apartment was big enough and well furnished. The host, Mis Shilpy's behaviour was too good, which impressed us. I'll look forward to staying there near future.

info: Rating, 4 stars,  · December 2021,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment:
Rudmila's place is spacious and can accommodate guests in four different rooms. Read the listing description/ rules prior to and after booking since it has different information. The host requires copies of passports or other forms of IDs from the guests. Now days it is not safe to provide this type information. In many countries the following information is only required from all guests:
- Full name
- Home address
- Nationality
- Passport number
The host can verify the physical copy of the passport, but it is up to the guest if they want to provide copies.
The Apartment is located walking distance to several restaurants, a shopping plaza/building, and many other locations of interest. Uber from the airport are able to arrive within minutes if requested and can be booked for up to 10 hours. Rudmila does has a housekeeper that is required to stay with the guest to provide cooking/cleaning services for an additional price. We did not opt-in for the service. The host communicates timely whenever needed. We had an overall good stay at her place and would consider booking again in the future.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · October 2021,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: Great place to stay, I stayed for 3 nights and it was like my home. Everything is near around, shopping, grocery’s, restaurants all are nearby. Host Rudmilla was cooperative and responding. House caretaker shilpi is very well trained, responsible and helpful. I will definitely choose this place for my next every visit to Dhaka.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · April 2021,  · Group trip
rating_comment: 10/10 would recommend this place for anyone who is traveling to Dhaka. Great communication and very accommodating host. Shilpy apu was amazing too!

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · September 2020,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment:
As an owner Rudmila apu is amazing person in case of responsiveness, though she stays outside she tried to make everything in order. The house is well secured, She has an amazing caretaker named Shilpi, who co-operated very nicely with all the guests. The house is nice, cozy, well organised. We had very peaceful time, My family never felt like its not their home. 😊

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · September 2020,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: This is a really nice place to spend your holiday bank in Bangladesh. It has a family vibe. It's a big place to accommodate your friends and relatives comfortably. The house was quite clean and every worked according to my expectation.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · August 2020,  · Group trip
rating_comment: Rudmila and her care taker are so helpful. Everyday they asked me is everything ok or not and they are so responsible. You can find everything nearby.I recommend them.

rating_comment: It's a very pleasant and wonderful experience we had at Mrs. Rudmila's place. Her caretaker was also very courteous and helpful.
